Proceed to scale the sketch using a scaling factor of 0.3. Next, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch, applying the specified euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 3D sketch by a distance of 0.225 towards the normal and 0.0 in the opposite direction. Extrude the 3D sketch with the following properties: - Extrude depth towards normal: 0.45 - Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 Apply the "Join Feature" operation for part 2, merging the new solid volume with the preceding CAD models. The resulting shape should be a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.</description>
